attributes.action: Allow the UK police force to be armed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a sad fact that crime in this country is getting more violent but its time that we face facts that the police who are there to protect us need to have the methods at hand to really make a difference.The whole gun crime thing is becoming a big thing where youths think its cool to pretend that there gangsters and that its ok to hurt and even kill someone as they feel that there friends will look up to them and they will get respect for it.Its only a matter of time before guns will be used in most crimes and we nee dto act now to help the police to do there job properly.
